wiki.text:
'Viewpoint' may refer to:

* A camera angle in photography, filmmaking, and other visual arts
* Viewpoint model, a computer science technique for making complex systems more
  comprehensible to human engineers
* ''Viewpoint'' (video game), shooter video game
* ''Viewpoint'' (card game), dedicated deck card game
* Viewpoint Corporation, a digital media company known for its subsidiary
  Fotomat ** Viewpoint Media Player, a software product made by Viewpoint
  Corporation
* Viewpoints, an acting technique based on improvisation
* Viewpoint School, a K-12 school in Calabasas CA
* Viewpoints Research Institute, a nonprofit public benefit organization to
  improve "powerful ideas education" for the world's children and to advance the
  state of systems research and personal computing
* ''Viewpoint'' (talk show), a TV talk show on Current TV
* ''Viewpoint'' (TV series), a Canadian current affairs television series which
  aired on CBC Television from 1957 to 1976
* ''Viewpoint'' (Philippine TV series), a now defunct late night public affairs
  talk show of GMA Network from 1984 to 1994
